description: Rugged, slim-fitting and fully featured, the Alpine Guide Pants are made for people who spend nearly every day in the mountains. Providing year-round versatility for ski touring, alpine climbing or trips that involve both, they’ll keep you covered and comfortable skinning up the approach, climbing on route or skiing back to basecamp. Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory.
name: Patagonia Alpine Guide Pants - Mens

specs.value: Two secure front pockets and two zippered thigh pockets provide ample storage
Vertical thigh vents allow you to dump heat on the uphill
Alpine and ski boot compatible; zippered, adjustable cuffs accommodate different boot sizes and secure with a snap; lightweight scuff guards protect against abrasion
Internal snow gaiters and tie-down loops for versatility
